tag_list: brewer, shettles, liquid, fusion, recording, studio, rock, founder, ceo, nyc
overview:
Founder / CEO of privately held Liquid Fusion (R) Records; Liquid Fusion (R) Film & Video; Liquid Fusion (R) American Clothing.

Active Voting Member Grammy Awards - Producer / Engineer Wing and as Writer / Guitarist.

Graduated Columbia College NY NY 1979 BA Molecular Biology. Studied as a Special Grad Student, Cognitive Psych: The University of Texas at Austin. Certified Television Producer: MNN TV Studios NYNY.

Independent study: Film / DeVito Productions (Commercial Film Production) - Asst to Dir for Diet Coke Spot / Aired Superbowl 1985.

Music Study: Songwriting: Martin Briley; Electric guitar/ music production: Alan Schwartz / Ray Gomez. Won acclaim as BMI Songwriter / Producer (1992): one of 20 winners from 5000 entries.

Recording studio combines vintage Telefunken 76 sound with / Revox MKIII reel-to-reel analog recording - plus digital tracking.

Listed in MIX magazine as: Liquid Fusion (R) Studios; Liquid Fusion (R) Music; Liquid Fusion (R) Records - for Audio / Video / Film production / Recording studios.
